derivation: from G1 (ἄφρων) (as a negative particle) and G5424 (ἄφρων);
strongs_def: properly, mindless, i.e. stupid, (by implication) ignorant, (specially) egotistic, (practically) rash, or (morally) unbelieving
outline:
1. without reason
  2. senseless, foolish, stupid
  3. without reflection or intelligence, acting rashly
